definition: not on time/late (public transport, airlines)/overdue/behind schedule/delayed

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: Steven was tardy this morning and alleges that his bus was late.
sentences.chinese: 芬今天早上遲到的說詞是公車誤點了。

sentences.english: We apologize for the late arrival of the plane from amsterdam.
sentences.chinese: 從阿姆斯特丹來的飛機誤點。

sentences.english: Farmer Monty Whipple is several weeks behind schedule.
sentences.chinese: 農民蒙蒂惠誤點了幾個星期。

sentences.english: The pilots' strike messed up our holiday.
sentences.chinese: 火車誤點，把我們的計劃的全弄糟了。

sentences.english: His excuse about the train being late doesn't ring true to me.
sentences.chinese: 他推說是火車誤點了，這話聽來不真實。

sentences.english: All the pas-sengers were fuming at the delay.
sentences.chinese: 所有旅客對誤點十分惱火。

sentences.english: We were running late, but lucked out because the bus was late too.
sentences.chinese: 我們遲到了，但是幸運的是，公交車也誤點了。

sentences.english: All the buses were late due to heavy traffic.
sentences.chinese: 因爲交通擁擠，所有公共汽車都誤點了。

sentences.english: The plane was late and detectives were waiting at the airport all morning.
sentences.chinese: 飛機誤點了，偵探們在機場等了整整一上午。

sentences.english: We complain of frequent delays and surly staff.
sentences.chinese: 我們抱怨經常性的誤點和態度惡劣的員工。

sentences.english: As often as not the buses are late on foggy day .
sentences.chinese: 每逢多霧天氣，公車往往誤點。

sentences.english: The plane has beendelayed by wretched weather.
sentences.chinese: 因天氣不好，飛機誤點了。

sentences.english: The plane is late due to fog.
sentences.chinese: 那班飛機因濃霧而誤點。

sentences.english: It was just announced that Flight 736 had been delayed because of air traffic.
sentences.chinese: 剛剛通知過，736航班因空中交通情況而誤點了。

definition: domestic flight/internal line (air, train, ferry etc)
lit. the whip cannot reach (idiom); beyond one's influence/too far to be able to help
attendant on an airplane, train, boat etc
to transfer/to change trains, buses etc
Cebu, a province (and a city) in the Philippines (Tw)
